name: VodBurner Crude Video File
summary: Learn about .VBC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: For Skype video calls, there will most likely be four VBC files associated with the call. For audio-only calls, there will be two VBC files.
NOTE: Netralia no longer develops VodBurner.

description: Video created by VodBurner, a program that allows you to record Skype conversations; contains raw video of a Skype conversation that is not directly playable but can be generated as an .MP4. .WMV, or .ASF file.
